alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Judith Basin and western Fergus Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Geyser to near Stanford to 17 miles west of Hobson. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Geyser, Windham, Benchland and Utica. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 20 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
